channel.description: Recent content in Stories on Roman Kurnovskii

item.title: Visualize Algorithms - Rediscovering Backtracking
item.description: Today, I tackled a LeetCode programming problem that pushed me to rediscover a forgotten concept and devise a creative solution to share my learning experience with others. The problem centered around a backtracking algorithm. Although I had previously explored this topic, I couldn’t quite remember the exact steps and logic involved. Determined to refresh my memory, I set out not only to solve the problem but also to find a way to make it easier for myself and others to visualize and comprehend the algorithm in the future.
